title: Rani Ruby & Polki Blossom Ring
materials: Ruby Cabochons. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant sheen.
features: This exquisite ring features a floral blossom design, meticulously handcrafted with Polki diamonds set in a closed setting (kundan setting). The pear-shaped Ruby cabochons add a pop of color and elegance. The ring showcases the fusion of traditional Indian craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic.
colors: accented by the vibrant red of the rubies and the subtle brilliance of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for upscale parties and events.
description: A stunning blend of tradition and contemporary design, this ring features high-quality Polki diamonds and vibrant rubies. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring lasting beauty and value. It's a timeless piece that can be passed down through generations.
